casebody.data:
State
v.
Donna Helms Ledbetter 402PA15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 22, 2016

Ms. Meghan AdelleJones, Attorney at Law, For Ledbetter, Donna Helms.

*528Ms. Ashleigh P. Dunston, Mr. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney Generals, Ms. Brandy Cook, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of December 2016 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of December 2016."
